sn3.17:4.3: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho rājā pasenadi kosalo bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn3.17:4.4: “atthi nu kho, bhante, eko dhammo yo ubho atthe samadhiggayha tiṭṭhati—
sn3.17:5.1: “Atthi kho, mahārāja, eko dhammo yo ubho atthe samadhiggayha tiṭṭhati—
sn3.17:6.1: “Katamo pana, bhante, eko dhammo, yo ubho atthe samadhiggayha tiṭṭhati—
sn3.17:7.1: “Appamādo kho, mahārāja, eko dhammo, yo ubho atthe samadhiggayha tiṭṭhati—
sn3.17:7.3: Seyyathāpi, mahārāja, yāni kānici jaṅgalānaṃ pāṇānaṃ padajātāni, sabbāni tāni hatthipade samodhānaṃ gacchanti, hatthipadaṃ tesaṃ aggamakkhāyati—
sn3.17:7.5: evameva kho, mahārāja, appamādo eko dhammo, yo ubho atthe samadhiggayha tiṭṭhati—
